alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:44AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Breathitt County through 730 AM EDT... At 644 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Curt, or near Jackson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Curt around 650 AM EDT. Jackson, Howard Creek, Dumont, Inverness, Copland, Saldee, Little and Whick around 655 AM EDT. Haddix, Lost Creek, Quicksand and Noctor around 700 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Flintville, Smith Branch, Portsmouth, Watts, Haginsville, Clayhole, Wilstacy, Press, Stevenson, Hardshell, Sikes, Ned and Lunah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
